# sse_private_resource (Data Source)

Fetches a single Private Resource by name.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the private resource to find.

### Read-Only

- `certificate_id` (Number) The ID of the certificate.
- `description` (String) The description of the private resource.
- `dns_server_id` (Number) The ID of the DNS server.
- `id` (Number) The ID of the private resource.
- `resource_group_ids` (List of Number) The list of resource group IDs.
